name: ShamansPath
description:
This is a metroidvania game made for a month long metroidvania game jam.

Survive the evil robots.

unlock new abilities.

defeat bosses.

The 2nd boss is the last boss so far. If you beat him, you beat the game.

This is unfinished, I intend on adding 1 or 2 more bosses, some puzzles, enemies, more abilities, and sound.
